1.title: New England Road Trip
1.plot: Antonio helps clear out a room filled with storage, and gives a mother and daughter the sunroom they've been dreaming about.

2.title: Michigan Road Trip
2.plot: From the hard working streets of Detroit, to the rolling farmlands down south, to the outdoor adventures of the north, we exploring one of the most versatile states in the country. Let's hit the road.

3.title: Alaskan Adventure
3.plot: From the country's highest mountain, to the Arctic Circle in everlasting daylight. We're headed to the last frontier, from dog sleds, to the gold rush, to the bears. Let's hit the road.

4.title: Chill in the Florida Keys, Art in St. Louis, Adventure on the Colorado River
4.plot: We go to where it's always summer: the Florida Keys. Then, Meet Me in St Louis. From the gateway to the West, to the architect of the West, we see the Colorado River up close, and check out the scene underground in Mammoth Caves.

5.title: Utah Road Trip
5.plot: We trek through the amazing red sandstone of the Big 5 National Parks, mountain bike some of the nation's best trails, and see some of the best back country skiers take on the steepest pitches in the state.

6.title: Colorado Road Trip
6.plot: We tour Denver, tackle best skiing in the country at Breckenridge, Vail, Crested Butte, and Telluride, and stick around until summer for mountain biking heaven. Let's hit the road.

7.title: Oregon Road Trip
7.plot: We tour Portland, head down the coast for epic sand boarding in Florence, and over into the Willamette National Forest for lava rock hiking and water sports. After rafting in Bend, we shoot to the Oregon Caves for underground exploration.

8.title: Arizona Road Trip
8.plot: After watching an historical gunfight at the OK Corral, we drive through the desert for family fun in Tucson, and then experience outdoor adventure in Sedona and Flagstaff.

9.title: Southern California Adventure
9.plot: We drive around beautiful SoCal, where we mingle with the stars of Hollywood, tour Hearst Castle, catch a wave with the local surfers in San Diego, and discover the allure of Joshua Tree.

10.title: Texas Road Trip
10.plot: As we visit iconic cities like Austin, San Antonio, Dallas and Houston, we see some amazing National Parks along way, and experience nearby art towns inspired by their surrounding natural beauty. Let's hit the road.

11.title: West Coast Road Trip
11.plot: In true American road trip fashion, we go from the lush Pacific Northwest, down the coast to sunny Southern California. We see beautiful mountains, famous National Parks, vibrant cities, and incredible wildlife.

12.title: Nevada Road Trip
12.plot: We cruise the desert to see what this southwestern state has to offer. We start in the gorgeous and action-packed Lake Tahoe area, hitch up in classic old west towns, and chill on the strip in Las Vegas.

13.title: Eastern New York Road Trip
13.plot: We cruise from the big apple to the rolling mountains of the Adirondacks. Get ready for a tour of the five boroughs, a pleasant drive through the Catskills, history along the Hudson, action in Hyde Park and adventure in the Adirondacks.

14.title: Hawaiian Adventure
14.plot: We discover magnificent beaches, stunning plant-life, and some of the world's coolest active volcanoes as we visit America's own private topical getaway: Hawaii. Let's hit the road...island style.

15.title: Northern California Road Trip
15.plot: Let's head west. Join us as we take a road trip through northern California. We'll visit some majestic redwood forests, cavernous valleys, beautiful bays and some of the nation most famous national parks.

16.title: Washington, DC and Maryland Road Trip
16.plot: Set the GPS for a monumental adventure as we drive through the nation's capital, Washington, D.C. and meander through Maryland for a big taste of history and succulent Chesapeake crab, of course. Let's hit the road.

17.title: Southeast Road Trip: Georgia and Florida
17.plot: Time catch some rays in the Southeast, road trip style. We hit Georgia's historic cities, island hop the Golden Isles, cruise the coast of Florida, get wild in the Everglades, and beach out on the Florida Keys.

18.title: Southern Road Trip
18.plot: Coast to Coast. We head across these great United States from Southern California all the way to Charleston, South Carolina. Hollywood, Joshua Tree, The Grand Canyon, Santa Fe, Memphis, and more. Let's hit the road.

19.title: East Coast Road Trip
19.plot: We hit the mountains, beaches, and boardwalks of the east coast. From Maine to Virginia, it's food, fun, and fantastic history. Grab your tasty cakes and whoopee pies. Let's hit the road.

20.title: Northern Road Trip
20.plot: Northbound. We start our epic northern road trip in Seattle, cruise through the state of Washington, camp in the forests of Idaho and Montana, explore the wonders of Yellowstone, and bask in the glory of Mount Rushmore. Let's hit the road.

imdb.plot outline: The new E/I series, State to State, travels to every entertaining nook and cranny of America. The hectic dazzle of the Big Apple. The rawhide spirit of Wyoming. The revival of St. Louis. The innovation of Silicon Valley. The music of New Orleans and Austin. The Vegas Glitz. The La Glamour. The highest peaks. The driest deserts. The biggest events. And the hidden gems. Everything from State to State. Let's hit the road!
imdb.title: State to State
plot: The new E/I series, _State to State_ (qv), travels to every entertaining nook and cranny of America. The hectic dazzle of the Big Apple. The rawhide spirit of Wyoming. The revival of St. Louis. The innovation of Silicon Valley. The music of New Orleans and Austin. The Vegas Glitz. The La Glamour. The highest peaks. The driest deserts. The biggest events. And the hidden gems. Everything from _State to State_ (qv). Let's hit the road!::Peter Mcdonnell
